title: South Korean Beauty Boom Proves Alluring to Investors - WSJ
text:
South Korean Beauty Boom Proves Alluring to Investors South Korean Beauty Boom Proves Alluring to Investors This copy is for your personal, non-commercial use only. Distribution and use of this material are governed by

Dow Jones Reprints at 1-800-843-0008 or visit www.djreprints.com. http://www.wsj.com/articles/south-korean-beauty-boom-proves-alluring-to-investors-1468785785 By July 17, 2016 4:03 pm ET SEOUL—Big overseas investors are snapping up stakes in South Korea’s cosmetics companies as demand for the country’s makeup and complex skin-care regimen increasingly attracts a global audience. On Monday, Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Bain Capital Private Equity plan to announce a deal to acquire a controlling stake in Carver Korea Co., a privately-held maker of specialty cosmetics, in a deal that will value the company at about $675 million, according to a person familiar with the matter.
